reviews.review_msg: Fairly easy, quite strict marker on quizzes. Oral presentation/exam was fairly marked. Final wasn't too hard if you study the textbook. This prof gives a lot of assignments. 1 textbook 1 workbook every week for 10% of the course. 10% participation,  10% quizzes (7 in total), 20% oral presen, 20% oral exam, and 30% Final exam.
